title: House in Fremd School district
posting_body: I WILL HAVE MORE PICTURES when house is all painted and tenant has moved.
Up for rent is a 3br 2.5 bath house that has been recently renovated and will be available  the END OF AUGUST.

It is in the prestigious Central Road Elementary School Grades: PK-6, Plum Grove Jr High School: Grades: 7-8, and the Wm Fremd High School districts, It has an attached 2.5 car garage, a full basement,  deck with grill.
The house resides in a very untraveled and super quiet back area of Rolling Meadows.
The house is part of the Plum Tree Home owners Association HOA which gives you access to a pool and clubhouse (see images) and is included in the rental price.
There is the salt creek walking path just outside your front door (see satellite image blue line marking path).
Credit check and verification of income mandatory.
